name: SushiFuss
description:
A chaotic little game about making Sushi.

Pick up ingredients, put them on your bamboo mat, roll your sushi, cut it, put it on a plate, and sell it. Fulfill orders in time or you will loose money. And don't run out of money. 

Have Fun :>

All the 3D assets except the red thingy on the wall are self made. We did not make the sounds but we have the right to use them. We used  the "Universal Sound FX"pack and Royalty Free Music from Bensound.  Sadly we ran out of time and could not polish :c.

Its our first game we made for a game jam <3.

Edit: Uploaded an new post jam version with some bug fixes.

You can buy new ingredients with the buttons over the corresponding bowls.
